thread.section_title: Citadines Les Halles Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location, Good Service
thread.title_full: Great Location, Good Service - Review of Citadines Les Halles Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Helena J
title: Great Location, Good Service
text: This hotel is a good choice, it offers a great convenient location, friendly service, good breakfast and nicely appointed clean and comfortable rooms. Walking distance to the Lourve, and the metro (30 mins on the metro to Charles De Gaulle Airport), its a great ground point for exploring Paris.
